2dcloud Shop

  • 100% ringspun cotton. Art by Margot Ferrick. Comes in S M L XL

    Books and zines featured in this collection: ITDN by Andrew Burkholder, Gulag Casual by Austin English, Mirror Mirror #1 by Nou, Tracy Auch, Andrea Bjürstrom, Leslie Weibeler, Caroline Hennessy, Nicholas Verstraeten, Katherine Poe, Margot Ferrick, Connor Willumsen, Leon Sadler [ed. Blaise Larmee], Sec by Margot Ferrick, Altcomics Magazine 2



    2dcloud takes chances on work that takes chances. Their optimism is contagious. The world of comics — and the world of culture — can’t afford to be without them.
    — Bill Kartalopoulos, The Best American Comics Series Editor

    2dcloud goes boldly where other comics publishers fear to tread.
    — Anders Nilsen
